Summary: White glowing orb hovering in West sky /2nd sighting
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Oak Lawn
There was one other sighting in Oak Lawn on or around August 19th 2008
divs: sighting detailsi had just gotten home and unloaded the car. i went out to the yard and looked towards the west sky and saw a white glowing orb hovering in the west sky very low on the horizon. it was very low that the planes that normally come in over the tree line were coming in way below the tree line. this orb hovering and probably moved a couple feet in 5 minutes. also it had a what looked like either a red then blue flash to it quickly. this glowing orb had no faa lights or moved like the rest of the midway traffic in the area. it also just disappeared without a trace. i saw this orb on sunday 8\17\2008. it was glowing white in about the same place around 8:20pm in the western sky. and it too was the same in appearance and had the same charateristics. except on sunday, the planes flew over it. the timing was about the same. took pictures.
